verses.verse: What <WG5101> shall we say <WG2046> then? <WG3767> Shall we continue <WG1961> in sin, <WG266> that <WG2443> grace <WG5485> may abound? <WG4121>
May it never be! <WG1096> We <WG2198> who <WG3748> died <WG599> to sin, <WG266> how <WG4459> could we live <WG2198> in <WG846> it any longer? <WG2089>
Or don't <WG50> you know that <WG3754> all we who <WG3754> were baptized <WG907> into <WG1519> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> were baptized <WG907> into <WG1519> his <WG846> death? <WG2288>

We were buried <WG4916> therefore <WG3767> with him <WG846> through <WG1223> baptism <WG908> to <WG1519> death, <WG2288> that <WG2443> just like <WG5618> Christ <WG5547> was raised <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498> through <WG1223> the glory <WG1391> of the Father, <WG3962> so <WG3779> we <WG2249> also <WG2532> might walk <WG4043> in <WG1722> newness <WG2538> of life. <WG2222>

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> we have become <WG1096> united with <WG4854> him in the likeness <WG3667> of his <WG846> death, <WG2288> we will <WG2071> also <WG2532> be <WG235> part of his resurrection; <WG386>

knowing <WG1097> this, <WG5124> that <WG3754> our <WG2257> old <WG3820> man <WG444> was crucified with <WG4957> him, <WG2443> that the body <WG4983> of sin <WG266> might be done away <WG2673> with, <WG3588> so that we <WG2248> would <WG1398> no <WG3371> longer be <WG1398> in bondage <WG1398> to sin. <WG266>
For <WG1063> he who has died <WG599> has been freed <WG1344> from <WG575> sin. <WG266>
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> we died <WG599> with <WG4862> Christ, <WG5547> we believe <WG4100> that <WG3754> we will <WG4800> also <WG2532> live with <WG4800> him; <WG846>

knowing <WG1492> that <WG3754> Christ, <WG5547> being raised <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead, <WG3498> dies <WG599> no more. <WG3765> Death <WG2288> no more <WG3765> has <WG2961> dominion <WG2961> over him! <WG846>
For <WG1063> the death that <WG3739> he died, <WG599> he died <WG599> to sin <WG266> one time; <WG2178> but <WG1161> the life that <WG3739> he lives, <WG2198> he lives <WG2198> to God. <WG2316>

Thus <WG3779> <WG5210> consider <WG3049> yourselves <WG1438> also <WG2532> to be <WG1511> dead <WG3498> <WG99999> to sin, <WG266> but <WG1161> alive <WG2198> to God <WG2316> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> Lord. <WG2962>

Therefore <WG3767> don't <WG3361> let <WG936> sin <WG266> reign <WG936> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> mortal <WG2349> body, <WG4983> that you should <WG1519> obey <WG5219> it <WG846> in <WG1722> its <WG846> lusts. <WG1939>

Neither <WG3366> present <WG3936> your <WG5216> members <WG3196> to sin <WG266> as <WG5613> instruments <WG3696> of unrighteousness, <WG93> but <WG235> present <WG3936> yourselves <WG1438> to God, <WG2316> as alive <WG2198> from <WG1537> the dead, <WG3498> and <WG2532> your <WG5216> members <WG3196> as instruments <WG3696> of righteousness <WG1343> to God. <WG2316>

For <WG1063> sin <WG266> will <WG2961> not <WG3756> have dominion over <WG2961> you. <WG5216> For <WG1063> you are <WG2075> not <WG3756> under <WG5259> law, <WG3551> but <WG235> under <WG5259> grace. <WG5485>

What <WG5101> then? <WG3767> Shall we sin, <WG264> because <WG3754> we are <WG2070> not <WG3756> under <WG5259> law, <WG3551> but <WG235> under <WG5259> grace? <WG5485> May it never <WG3361> be! <WG1096>

Don't <WG3756> you <WG1492> know that <WG3754> to whom <WG3739> you present <WG3936> yourselves <WG1438> as servants <WG1401> to <WG1519> obedience, <WG5218> his servants <WG1401> you are <WG2075> whom <WG3739> you obey; <WG5219> whether <WG2273> of sin <WG266> to <WG1519> death, <WG2288> or <WG2228> of obedience <WG5218> to <WG1519> righteousness? <WG1343>

But <WG1161> thanks <WG5485> be to God, <WG2316> that, <WG3754> whereas you were <WG2258> bondservants <WG1401> of sin, <WG266> <WG1161> you became obedient <WG5219> from <WG1537> the heart <WG2588> to <WG1519> that form <WG5179> of teaching <WG1322> whereunto <WG3739> you were delivered. <WG3860>
<WG1161> Being <WG1659> made free <WG1659> from <WG575> sin, <WG266> you became bondservants <WG1402> of righteousness. <WG1343>

I speak <WG3004> in human <WG442> terms because of <WG1223> the weakness <WG769> of your <WG5216> flesh, <WG4561> for <WG1063> as <WG5618> you presented <WG3936> your <WG5216> members <WG3196> as servants <WG1401> to uncleanness <WG167> and <WG2532> to wickedness <WG458> upon <WG1519> wickedness, <WG458> even so <WG3779> now <WG3568> present <WG3936> your <WG5216> members <WG3196> as servants <WG1401> to righteousness <WG1343> for <WG1519> sanctification. <WG38>
For <WG1063> when <WG3753> you were <WG2258> servants <WG1401> of sin, <WG266> you were <WG2258> free <WG1658> in regard to righteousness. <WG1343>

What <WG5101> fruit <WG2590> then <WG5119> did you <WG2192> have at that time in <WG1909> the things of which <WG3739> you are <WG1870> now <WG3568> ashamed? <WG1870> For <WG1063> the end <WG5056> of those things <WG1565> is death. <WG2288>

But <WG1161> now, <WG3570> being made free <WG1659> from <WG575> sin, <WG266> and <WG1161> having become servants <WG1402> of God, <WG2316> you have <WG2192> your <WG5216> fruit <WG2590> of <WG1519> sanctification, <WG38> and <WG1161> the result <WG5056> of eternal <WG166> life. <WG2222>

For <WG1063> the wages <WG3800> of sin <WG266> is death, <WG2288> but <WG1161> the free gift <WG5486> of God <WG2316> is eternal <WG166> life <WG2222> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> Lord. <WG2962>
